main_description: To receive money from payment transactions as you have Deposit Authorization enabled, you must preauthorize the senders of those Payments. Any payments from an account not in the list will be rejected.
trouble_shoot: If you are having difficulty sending a payment to your account you can temporarily disable the Deposit Authorization.
not_enabled: Is not enabled there is no restriction to which accounts can send your account a payment.
warning: No account can make a payment to this wallet.
list_information: Add accounts that can make payments to this wallet.
challenge_body_1: When Deposit Authorization is enabled can you withdraw funds from an exchange to this wallet?
challenge_body_2: If you have added accounts to your authorized list and Deposit Authorization is disabled. Will your account block any transactions?
challenge_body_3: If you incorrectly authorized an exchanges hotwallet, for example you only add their deposit address and not their with drawl address. Your with drawl transaction to your wallet now fails at the exchange, what do you do?
challenge_body_4: Can Deposit Authorization be toggled on and off? Where by you temporarily allow any transaction.
challenge_1_ans_b: Only if an account is authorized
challenge_1_ans_c: Only accounts in your xaman address book will be accepted
challenge_2_ans_b: Accounts on the Deposit Authorization can only make deposits
challenge_2_ans_c: Only spam transactions will be blocked
challenge_3_ans_a: Post on social networks blaming the XRPL does not work
challenge_3_ans_b: Accounts on the Deposit Authorization list can only make deposits
challenge_3_ans_c: Disable Deposit Authorization and contact the exchange so they retry the with drawl
challenge_4_ans_b: Once it's active it can not be disabled
fail_heading: Insufficient knowledge to use this xApp
fail_body: You failed to meet the minimum understanding needed to use this app. Please review the material at
